# excludesCategory(category)

**Instance Method**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to exclude a category from a search.

## Declaration

```swift
excludesCategory(category: AddressCategory): boolean;
```

## Querying filter behavior

- **includesCategory(category)**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to include a category from a search.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to include a category from a search.
items.name: includesCategory(category)
